data.name: Aeon of Sands - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
22 High Quality Music Tracks

22 high quality MP3 192kbit/48Hz tracks, composed and performed by Gabriele Artuso, with a few bonus tracks by Marco Pedrana, for 35 minutes of great ambient and theme music.

The collection, combines the exotic feelings of the desert of Aeon of Sands with those of a tense movie out of the 80’s.

Track list:

* 01 - Main Theme, 7th - [0:48]
* 02 - Main Theme, 6th - take 2 - [2:46]
* 03 - A Ruin - [0:49]
* 04 - Dialogue Modern - [1:34]
* 05 - Manpac - Brynn - [1:25]
* 06 - Kovas Camp Exploration - [0:37]
* 07 - Aeon of Sands - Main Theme - [2:18]
* 08 - Kovas Camp Intermezzo - [0:36]
* 09 - Fallen Branchways - [1:05]
* 10 - Oasis - [2:27]
* 11 - Nematazi - Precint - [1:09]
* 12 - Pantella Grounds Evening - [1:40]
* 13 - The Pits - [1:01]
* 14 - Pantella Theme - [5:12]
* 15 - Ending - Shadow - [1:48]
* 16 - Snoring - [1:01]
* 17 - Underroots 2nd - [1:23]
* 18 - Underroots 1st - [1:22]
* 19 - Main Theme 2nd - [2:04]
* 20 - The Desert - [0:54]
* 21 - Manpac 1st - [0:43]
* 22 - Ending - Aphelion - [2:38]
